title: Do Apple AirPods Pro make a worthy upgrade from the normal AirPods? - Quora
tags: Apple iPhone and Apple Watch Event (September 2016)

response.answer_text: No get powerbeats pro they sound better last 9 hours and sweat proof and just overall better they don't have noise canceling but you won't be able to hear anything except what's coming out of the powerbeats pro they now come in more colors instead of boring apple white. I have a black pair of powerbeats pro got them last year and love them especially when I'm watching something on YouTube or tubi or Disney plus. Music sounds great on the powerbeats pro too
Depends on what you use them for, and what you are upgrading from. I just switched from my first gen AirPods and for me the noise cancelling feature makes them totally worth it.
